resources.string: No car has been configured yet. Please tap the button to add a car and start tracking it.
You have to enable bluetooth to be able to see the list of paired devices and to choose your car.
No paired device could be found. Please make sure you paired your phone with your car and that you did not already configure the car you\'re looking for.
Please select the bluetooth device corresponding to your car
You can modify these settings regarding your new car
Change the system name given for this device as well
